sentences.en: an increase of this order of magnitude
An operation of this magnitude is going to be difficult.
sentences.cn: 这么大的手术实施起来十分困难。

sentences.en: Dependable production is just as important as the magnitude of output.
sentences.cn: 可靠的生产和巨大生产量一样重要.

sentences.en: I want to know the magnitude of this equipment.
sentences.cn: 我想知道这个设备的大小.

sentences.en: It made his role more extravagant, of greater magnitude.
sentences.cn: 这一来他的地位就更高不可攀了, 身份就更尊贵了.

sentences.en: Its conservation law encompasses both its magnitude and its direction.
sentences.cn: 它的守恒定律包括大小和方向两方面.

sentences.en: Lily was duly impressed by the magnitude of her opportunities.
sentences.cn: 选择良偶的重要性丽莉早已深深地铭刻在心.

sentences.en: No one comprehended the magnitude of the problem then.
sentences.cn: 当时无人认识到这一问题的严重性.

sentences.en: Numbers of this enormous magnitude are very difficult to comprehend.
sentences.cn: 这个巨大的数字是很难想象的.

sentences.en: Physical properties that are completely specified by their magnitude are called scalars.
sentences.cn: 物理性质完全由其大小所确定者叫做标量.

sentences.en: Stars of the first magnitude are the brightest.
The auditorium is a building of great magnitude.
sentences.cn: 这个大礼堂是一栋巨大的建筑物.

sentences.en: The device speed has improved by two orders of magnitude since 1960.
sentences.cn: 自1960年至今,器件速度已改善了两个数量级.

sentences.en: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.cn: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

sentences.en: The time delay would be smaller by eight orders of magnitude.
sentences.cn: 如果按8个数量级来看，延时量会显得小一些。

sentences.en: Then , too, the Soviet airlift was growing in magnitude.
sentences.cn: 还有, 苏联的空运规模日益增大.

sentences.en: These are issues of great magnitude.

phrases.tran_cn: 地震震级，地震等级；地震规模

trans.tran_cn: 巨大，广大，重大，重要，量级，（地震）级数
trans.tran_en: the great size or importance of something
